alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the thiophosphoric acid functional group or a derivative thereof, with the general structure ROP(OR')(OR'')=S, where exactly three R-groups are organyl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Thiophosphate triesters

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds contaning a phenoxy group.
alternative_parents.name: Phenoxy compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a benzene with exactly two chlorine atoms attached to it.
alternative_parents.name: Dichlorobenzenes

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more iodine atoms attached to a benzene.
alternative_parents.name: Iodobenzenes

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl iodide functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl iodides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl chloride functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl chlorides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and an oxygen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organooxygen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and an iodine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organoiodides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a chlorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organochlorides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Organic compounds containing the thiophosphoric acid functional group or a derivative thereof, with the general structure RP(R')(R'')=S, where R,R',R'' = O,N, halogen residue.
class.name: Organic thiophosphoric acids and derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as phenyl thiophosphates. These are organothiophosphorus compounds that contain a thiophosphoric acid O-esterified with a phenyl group.

direct_parent.description: Organothiophosphorus compounds that contain a thiophosphoric acid O-esterified with a phenyl group.
direct_parent.name: Phenyl thiophosphates

intermediate_nodes.description: Organic compounds containing the thiophosphoric acid functional group or a derivative thereof, with the general structure ROP(OR')(OR'')=S, where at least one R-group is an aryl group.
intermediate_nodes.name: Aryl thiophosphates

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds containing the thiophosphoric acid functional group or a derivative thereof, with the general structure ROP(OR')(OR'')=S, where at least one R-group is an organyl group.
subclass.name: Thiophosphoric acid esters

superclass.description: Compounds an organic acid or a derivative thereof.
superclass.name: Organic acids and derivatives
